title: Ankara-themed default hero background (orange & navy) with admin-upload precedence

requirements.summary: Add the generated orange & navy Ankara-print hero background image as a static asset under frontend/public/assets/generated.
acceptanceCriteria: A new image file exists at frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-bg-ankara-orange-navy-print.dim_2400x1350.png
The image is a seamless-looking Ankara-inspired fabric print with a dominant orange + navy palette and high visual contrast suitable for a hero background

file_operations.description: Add the provided/generated Ankara-inspired fabric print background image (2400x1350) with dominant orange + navy palette and seamless pattern styling.

requirements.summary: Use the generated Ankara image as the homepage hero background fallback when no admin-uploaded hero image is configured, preserving the existing overlay readability behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: If adminConfig.homepageVisuals.heroImage is not set, the HomePage hero renders with background image /assets/generated/hero-bg-ankara-orange-navy-print.dim_2400x1350.png
If adminConfig.homepageVisuals.heroImage is set, the uploaded image continues to take precedence (no regression)
Hero text remains readable due to the existing overlay color + opacity logic

file_operations.description: Update hero background style resolution so that when homepageVisuals.heroImage is missing, the hero uses the static asset frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-bg-ankara-orange-navy-print.dim_2400x1350.png as the background image while continuing to apply the existing overlay color + opacity logic for text readability; keep admin-uploaded hero image as the higher-precedence source when present.

requirements.summary: Ensure existing admin homepage visuals controls (upload + overlay controls + gradient/color field) continue to function without changing user-facing English text.
acceptanceCriteria: Admins can still upload a hero background image from the Admin Dashboard and see it on the homepage hero after saving
Admins can still adjust overlay color/opacity and see the effect on the homepage hero
No user-facing text is changed away from English as part of this update

file_operations.description: Harden state initialization so the hero image preview/state properly clears when no heroImage exists in settings (prevent stale previews), preserving existing upload flow and overlay color/opacity + gradient/color field behavior; do not change any user-facing copy away from English.
